newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech BICS100 bond index rises 0.002pts to 102.649.
newsitem.headline: Czech BICS100 bond index rises 0.002pts to 102.649.

text.p: The BICS 100 index measuring the Czech Republic's most liquid bonds rose 0.002 points in Tuesday's trading to 102.649 points, bank Ceska Sporitelna said.
It said the duration of the index portfolio gained 0.211 points to 3.011 years.
The index can also be found on Reuters page .BICS.

The BICSG 100 index, which Ceska Sporitelna calculates using only government bonds, rose 0.011 points to 99.574, the bank said, and the duration of the index portfolio gained 0.152 points to 2.563 years.
It said the yield index YBICS 1000 rose 4.169 points to 1,059.819.
